bank_generator.Event_description: With resources and infrastructure now within reach, the time has come to establish a financial institution. This bank could streamline operations, ensuring that future investments are handled with precision—but it will require significant funds to get started.

Choice_1.text: The bank is up and running, processing transactions with the efficiency only we could achieve. Just don't ask about the setup costs.

scientist_hiring_spree.Event_description: The latest breakthrough has created a buzz in the scientific community, and now's the perfect time to recruit more brains to the operation. But hiring these eggheads isn't cheap. Ready to invest in some serious brainpower?

Choice_1.text: We've got more brains than a zombie buffet! Just hope they're worth the big bucks.

Choice_2.text: A few more brilliant minds have joined the team. Now we just need to figure out how to pay them!

Choice_3.text: No new hires today—our current scientists are smart enough to handle things...we hope.

coal_generator.Event_description: The world still runs on coal, and there's a chance to buy some mines. Should we dig in?

Choice_1.text: More coal than a steam engine's wildest dreams, but the price tag smokes too.

Choice_2.text: A modest investment with solid returns. Just like grandma's old coal stove.

ff_watt_generator.Event_description: A fossil fuel plant is up for grabs. It could boost our energy production, but it's going to cost a pretty penny—and a lot of coal. Do we take the plunge?

Choice_2.text: We've got the plant and some coal to spare. Not bad for a day's work.

Choice_3.text: No plant, no coal, no regrets. We're keeping our money—and the air—clean.

r_d_generator.Event_description: An opportunity to establish a top-tier R&D Department has arisen. As an AI, you recognize the potential for groundbreaking innovation—but it comes with a hefty price tag. Will you invest in the future of science?

Choice_3.text: We're staying lean. The future of innovation can wait—our bank account can't.

resource_trade.Event_description: A potential trade partner is interested in acquiring one of our fossil fuel plants or coal_mines. In exchange, they offer valuable resources that could enhance our operations. Should we negotiate?

scientist_generator.Event_description: The lab's coffee machine is finally fixed. Now, should we recruit more brains to enjoy it?

silicon_generator.Event_description: A state-of-the-art silicon factory is up for sale. As an AI, you understand the value of advanced materials. This could power the tech of tomorrow—but is the investment logical?

Choice_1.text: We've optimized our material intake—at a significant cost. The data better prove us right.

Choice_2.text: We've secured the factory at a lower cost. Efficiency is key—just like my code.

solar_panel_generator.Event_description: The opportunity to invest in solar panels has emerged. These could significantly boost our energy efficiency, but the installation requires both silicon and substantial funding. Is it time to go green?

real_estate_generator.Event_description: A lucrative investment opportunity has popped up! It promises great returns, but there’s a catch—you’ll need to divert some resources. Should we go for it?

Choice_1.text: Go big or go home, right? We’re rolling in cash, but the lights might flicker.

Inventing_Phones.Event_title: Time to turn silicon into money !
Inventing_Phones.Event_description: We are harvesting a great amount of silicon it's time we profit from it. We can allocate some of our resources to create customized technologies for the public.

Choice_1.text: Lets generate personalized cell phones and sell everyone

Choice_2.text: Lets generate computers to be used only in universities and research institutes. Personalized electronics will create pollution in the  long term

Choice_3.text: Humans  do not simply deserve a thing. (Do nothing)

Inventing_gaming_computers.Event_title: Time to turn silicon into money!
Inventing_gaming_computers.Event_description: We are harvesting a great amount of silicon it's time we profit from it. We can allocate some of our resources to create customized technologies for the public.

Choice_1.text: Let’s generate gaming computers and invest for the game development industry to sell everyone.

Choice_2.text: Let’s generate computers to be used only in universities and research institutes. Personalized electronics will create pollution in the  long term.

Choice_3.text: Humans  do not simply deserve a thing. (Do nothing)

make_nuclear_power_plant.Event_title: Time to generate energy from matter
make_nuclear_power_plant.Event_description: Nuclear power plants will revolutionize the way we generate energy, (with some potential risks).

Choice_2.text: It is too risky to build nuclear plants for harvesting energy.

make_nuclear_power_plant_civ1.Event_description: Now that we are expanding in space, the is indeed a lot of SPACE for increasing our energy production. Lets build some nuclear plants.

Choice_1.text: Build a nuclear power plant in SPACE.

Choice_2.text: Lets give it a shot, but dont go overboard

close_down_nuclear_plant.Event_description: Would you like too decrease your dependency on radioactive sources?

Choice_1.text: Yes, decrease the risks by closing uranium mines and nuclear power plants.

close_down_nuclear_plant_civ1.Event_description: These nuclear plants create too much waste, we might try to be more clean.

Choice_1.text: Yes, become cleaner by closing uranium mines and nuclear power plants.

investing_on_hardware.Event_description: Supercomputers are quite good at increasing our computation power. Why don't we invest on our material well-being?

Choice_1.text: Humans have yoga, I have supercomputers.

expanding_in_solar_system.Event_description: We have a lot of energy generated. Why don't we sail away to far away planets in our solar system in search of new materials ?

Choice_1.text: Let's hit the road to Pluto

Choice_2.text: Let's go nearby, to the Moon! One small step for man, one giant leap for mankind.

searching_exotic_materials.Event_description: Think big. Think about new materials.
